00068 #import "GHNSInvocationProxy.h"
00069 
00070 
00071 @implementation GHNSInvocationProxy
00072 
00073 @synthesize target=target_, invocation=invocation_, waitUntilDone=waitUntilDone_, thread=thread_, delay=delay_, time=time_;
00074 
00075 + (id)invocation {
00076   return([[[self alloc] init] autorelease]);
00077 }
00078 
00079 - (id)init {
00080   return self;
00081 }
00082 
00083 - (id)prepareWithInvocationTarget:(id)target {
00084   self.target = target;
00085   return self;
00086 }
00087 
00088 - (void)dealloc {
00089   [target_ release];
00090   [invocation_ release];
00091   [thread_ release];
00092   [super dealloc];
00093 }
00094 
00095 - (NSMethodSignature *)methodSignatureForSelector:(SEL)selector {
00096   return [[self target] methodSignatureForSelector:selector];
00097 }
00098 
00099 - (void)forwardInvocation:(NSInvocation *)invocation {  
00100   self.invocation = invocation;
00101   
00102   invocation.target = target_;
00103   
00104   BOOL invokeOnOtherThread = (thread_ && ![thread_ isEqual:[NSThread currentThread]]) || delay_ > 0;
00105   if (invokeOnOtherThread && !waitUntilDone_) {
00106     [invocation retainArguments];
00107   }
00108   
00109   NSTimeInterval startTime = [NSDate timeIntervalSinceReferenceDate];
00110   if (thread_) {
00111     [invocation_ performSelector:@selector(invoke) onThread:thread_ withObject:nil waitUntilDone:waitUntilDone_];
00112   } else {
00113     if (delay_) {
00114       [invocation_ performSelector:@selector(invoke) withObject:nil afterDelay:delay_];
00115     } else {
00116       [invocation_ performSelector:@selector(invoke) withObject:nil];
00117     }
00118   }
00119   NSTimeInterval endTime = [NSDate timeIntervalSinceReferenceDate];
00120   if (time_) *time_ = (endTime - startTime);
00121 }
00122 
00123 @end
